official_title: A bill to provide for the exchange of land for the Cape Henry Memorial site in Fort Story, Virginia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretaries of the Interior and the Army to exchange specified lands in Virginia to relocate the Cape Henry Memorial Cross as part of Colonial National Historical Park.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the exchange of land for the Cape Henry Memorial site in Fort Story, Virginia.
